mapper.select: /*(equipMapper.getOnlyEquipList) */ select a.spot_equip_no --—관리번호 , a.spot_no --—작업장번호 , a.equip_no --—장비번호 , b.spot_nm --—작업장명 , c.equip_nm --—설비명 , b.svc_tp from spot_equip a join spot_info b on a.spot_no = b.spot_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' join equip_info c on a.equip_no = c.equip_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn ='Y' join cust_info d on a.cust_no = d.cust_no and d.used_yn ='Y' order by a.spot_no asc where a.cust_no = #{custNo} and a.used_yn ='Y'

select count(a.spot_equip_no) from spot_equip a join spot_info b on a.spot_no = b.spot_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' join equip_info c on a.equip_no = c.equip_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn ='Y' join cust_info d on b.cust_no = a.cust_no and d.used_yn ='Y' where a.cust_no = #{custNo} and a.used_yn ='Y'

/* (equipMapper.getEquipMngrHstrDouble)*/ SELECT b.* FROM (select b.spot_no, MAX(a.mngr_hstr_no) AS MNGR_HSTR_NO FROM equip_mngr_hstr a JOIN spot_equip b ON a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no GROUP BY b.spot_no) a JOIN ( SELECT a.min_lmt_val --—최소값 ,a.max_lmt_val --—최대값 ,a.meas_val --—측정값 ,c.spot_nm --—측정장 ,c.spot_no ,c.svc_tp ,b.max_lmt_val AS st_max_lmt_val ,b.min_lmt_val AS st_min_lmt_val ,a.mngr_hstr_no ,b.equip_no ,to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'HH24:MI') as meas_dt -- —측정시 ,to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') as meas_ymd -- —측정일 from equip_mngr_hstr a join spot_equip b on a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn ='Y' join spot_info c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.cust_no = #{custNo} ) b ON a.mngr_hstr_no = b.mngr_hstr_no where 1 = 1
AND b.spot_no = 27 or b.spot_no = 28 or b.spot_no = 29 or b.spot_no = 30
AND b.spot_no = 27 or b.spot_no = 28
AND b.spot_no = 29 or b.spot_no = 30
ORDER BY b.spot_no

/* (equipMapper.getEquipMngrHstrHdfdVer)*/ SELECT b.*, e.fr_unix_hms FROM (select b.spot_equip_no, MAX(a.mngr_hstr_no) AS MNGR_HSTR_NO FROM equip_mngr_hstr a JOIN spot_equip b ON a.spot_equip_no = b.spot_equip_no where b.spot_equip_no in (7817,7819,7821,7822,7823) GROUP BY b.spot_equip_no) a JOIN ( select b.spot_nm , a.spot_equip_no , c.mngr_hstr_no, c.alarm_yn , c.meas_val , c.unix_hms from spot_equip a join spot_info b on a.spot_no = b.spot_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn ='Y' join equip_mngr_hstr c on a.spot_equip_no = c.spot_equip_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn = 'Y' where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.cust_no = #{custNo} ) b ON a.mngr_hstr_no = b.mngr_hstr_no join (select spot_equip_no , cust_no , max(oper_no) as oper_no from oper_mast om where spot_equip_no = 7817 and om.cust_no = #{custNo} group by spot_equip_no ) c join oper_mast e on e.oper_no = c.oper_no
/* (equipMapper.getComboEquipList)*/ SELECT a.equip_no as value ,a.equip_nm as text from equip_info a where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.cust_no = #{custNo} order by equip_nm

/* (equipMapper.getCheckItemList)*/ SELECT max(a.mngr_hstr_no) as mngr_hstr_no --이력번호 , case when max(a.fe_yn) = 'Y' then 'O' else 'X' end as fe_yn --Fe 검출여부 , case when max(a.sus_yn) = 'Y' then 'O' else 'X' end as sus_yn --SUS 검출여부 , case when max(a.prod_fe_yn) = 'Y' then 'O' else 'X' end as prod_fe_yn --Prod+Fe 검출여부 , case when max(a.prod_sus_yn) = 'Y' then 'O' else 'X' end as prod_sus_yn --Prod+SUS 검출여부 , case when max(a.prod_yn) = 'Y' then 'O' else 'X' end as prod_yn --제품 검출여부 , d.prod_nm --제품명 , d.prod_no --제품번호 , to_char(to_timestamp(max(a.unix_hms)),'HH24:MI') as meas_dt -- —측정시간 , to_char(to_timestamp(max(a.unix_hms)), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as meas_date --측정일자, 시간 , b.code_nm as shape --제품형태 , max(c.test_tp) as final_test_tp , a.spot_equip_no -- 장비설비번호 , f.spot_nm --설비명 , max(g.equip_report_no ) as equip_report_no --보고서 번호 FROM equip_mngr_hstr a JOIN oper_mast c ON a.oper_no = c.oper_no and a.cust_no = c.cust_no and c.used_yn ='Y' JOIN prod_info d ON c.prod_no = d.prod_no and a.cust_no = d.cust_no and d.used_yn = 'Y' join code_info b on d.prod_shape = b.code_no join spot_equip e on c.spot_equip_no = e.spot_equip_no and a.cust_no = e.cust_no and c.used_yn ='Y' join spot_info f on e.spot_no = f.spot_no and a.cust_no = f.cust_no and f.used_yn = 'Y' left join equip_report g on a.mngr_hstr_no = g.mngr_hstr_no and a.cust_n = g.cust_no and g.used_yn = 'Y' where a.cust_no = #{custNo} and a.used_yn ='Y' and to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.spot_equip_no = #{spotEquipNo} group by d.prod_nm, b.code_nm , a.spot_equip_no , f.spot_nm , d.prod_no order by max(a.mngr_hstr_no) desc limit 150

/* (equipMapper.getOnlyOperList)*/ SELECT a.oper_no, to_char(to_timestamp(a.fr_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as fr_meas_dt, to_char(to_timestamp(a.to_unix_hms),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as to_meas_dt, b.prod_nm, a.shape, a.oper_text FROM oper_mast a JOIN prod_info b ON a.prod_no = b.prod_no and a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn ='Y' where a.cust_no = #{custNo} and a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.to_unix_hms != 0 order by a.oper_no desc limit 10
